experiences.description: Developed applications using ReactJS, TypeScript and Next.js, optimizing backoffice systems and e-commerce platforms. Provided technical support, resolving incidents and ensuring proper system functionality. Combined technical skills with attention to detail to enhance user experience and operational efficiency.

description: As lead frontend developer, built a web application with React.js and TypeScript for a loan management system, collaborating with the backend team. Implemented modules for investments, suppliers and projects, featuring a dual-role system for clients (businesses) and investors (individuals or legal entities) with different permissions and functionalities.

Developed a comprehensive user, role and permission management system, integrating the interface with a NestJS API built by another team member while ensuring efficient coordination between both components.

Led frontend development of an administrative system using Forest Admin, creating custom actions and dynamic forms. Built the user, role and permission management system from scratch, integrating it with a NestJS API developed by another team member.

experiences.companyName: Wholesale Business Group for Consumer Goods
experiences.description: Developed an enterprise management system using Symfony, PHP and PostgreSQL focused on basic accounting units. Followed MVC pattern and Scrum methodology, implementing inventory, customer, supplier and billing modules.
